description: Emery Mwazulu Diyabanza said he went to the Paris museum to claim "the stolen property of Africa".
title: France fines Congo activist for seizing Paris museum artefact
title_page: France fines Congo activist for seizing Paris museum artefact - BBC News
maintext: He told the New York Times last month: "The fact that I had to pay my own money to see what had been taken by force, this heritage that belonged back home where I come from - that's when the decision was made to take action."
